column2: and both times it was phenomenal.  This is the only Tapas place I've been to so I don't have much of a basis for comparision
column3: but as far as food goes it is awesome.   Baked Goat cheesey is probably one of my favorite dishes of all time.  The first time we went with a large group and the waiter was a real help and not overly attentive
column4: and for some reason comped two pitchers of sangria for us.  Second time was on a hot date and our server recommended the raw fish on special.  This was not very good
column5: but besides that and a couple minimal waits to sit
